author: newsr.in
title: Sean Penn Supports Daughter Dylan Penn at Her Movie Premiere!
text: Dylan Penn‘s dad Sean Penn steps out to support her big screen debut with Condemned‘s Screamfest premiere on Sunday (October 18) at the TCL Chinese Theater in Hollywood. That evening, Sean was seen leaving Freida Pinto‘s birthday party at the Nice Guy. The next day, Dylan made an appearance on Extra in Hollywood to promote [...] »
